item.description:
Boston SEO & Affiliate Marketing Networking Group meets the first Monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room That holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking & FOOD from sponsor...

eBiz Symposiom's Boston Internet Marketing Event
By Mich√®le Meagher
Director of the eBiz Symposium & Arlington Chamber of Commerce
Blogs about local Arlington businesses & events

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:45 to 8:15pm: Guest Speaker:

Amit Mehta is a Super Affiliate, speaker,
author and blogger.

He is currently the lead instructor and
coach at PPCClassroom.com.

Amit spent his life studying Physics (not
a single course in marketing).

While in graduate school, where he
earned only $1,277/month, he looked into
affiliate marketing.

$20,000 in debt and in a job he hated,
Amit started building up his part-time
affiliate marketing venture.

Today, with just a few hours a day, he
makes over $3.5 million a year using just
PPC and affiliate marketing.

websites :
Super Affiliate Mindset
PPC Classroom


8:15 to 8:45pm Open Round Table Discussion


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston SEO Networking Group
